mapper.sql: SELECT e.`EQUIPMENT_NO`, e.`CREATE_BY`, e.`CREATE_TIME`, e.`LAST_MODIFY_BY`, e.`LAST_MODIFY_TIME`, e.`DELETE_FLAG`, e.`GROUP_NO`, e.`EQUIPMENT_NAME`, e.`SUB_GROUP_NO`, e.sort, e.remark, cg.CONSTANT_NAME as GROUP_NAME, e.SUB_GROUP_NO , d.CONSTANT_NAME as SUB_GROUP_NAME from test.equipment e inner join test.constant cg on e.GROUP_NO = cg.CONSTANT_NO inner join test.constant d on e.SUB_GROUP_NO = d.CONSTANT_NO
mapper.select:
select count(1) from test.equipment e inner join ( select r.equipment_no as equipment_no,r.repair_level as repair_level , con.CONSTANT_NAME as repair_name, group_concat(c.company_name separator ',') as company_names , r.TIME_LIMIT,r.REMARK from test.report r inner join test.company c on r.COMPANY_NO = c.COMPANY_NO and c.DELETE_FLAG = 0 inner join test.constant con on r.REPAIR_LEVEL = con.CONSTANT_NO and con.DELETE_FLAG = 0 where r.DELETE_FLAG = 0 group by r.equipment_no,r.repair_level,con.CONSTANT_NAME,r.TIME_LIMIT,r.REMARK
) t on e.equipment_no = t.equipment_no and e.DELETE_FLAG = 0 inner join test.constant cg on e.GROUP_NO = cg.CONSTANT_NO and cg.DELETE_FLAG = 0 inner join test.constant d on e.SUB_GROUP_NO = d.CONSTANT_NO and d.DELETE_FLAG = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Equipment ( `EQUIPMENT_NO`, `CREATE_BY`, `LAST_MODIFY_BY`, `DELETE_FLAG`, `GROUP_NO`, `EQUIPMENT_NAME`, `SUB_GROUP_NO`, `SORT`, `REMARK`, `CREATE_TIME`, `LAST_MODIFY_TIME` ) VALUES( #{equipmentNo}, #{createBy}, #{lastModifyBy}, #{deleteFlag}, #{groupNo}, #{equipmentName}, #{subGroupNo}, #{sort}, #{remark}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO Equipment ( `EQUIPMENT_NO`, `CREATE_BY`, `LAST_MODIFY_BY`, `DELETE_FLAG`, `GROUP_NO`, `EQUIPMENT_NAME`, `SUB_GROUP_NO`, `CREATE_TIME`, `LAST_MODIFY_TIME`, `REMARK` ) VALUES
( #{item.equipmentNo}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.lastModifyBy}, #{item.deleteFlag}, #{item.groupNo}, #{item.equipmentName}, #{item.subGroupNo}, now(), now(), #{item.remark} )
